Plugin.Details: Checks if a class is properly constructed, i.e. that the 'this' reference does not escape during construction.

Detector.Details: Starts proper construction check for class under inspection.

BugPattern.LongDescription: 'this' reference escapes before object is properly constructed
BugPattern.Details: Due to the way double-precision floating point values are represented in Java, creating a new BigDecimal from a double is unreliable and may produce surprising results.
